text: Stanley Edward Petry (born August 14, 1966) is a former American and Canadian football defensive back in the National Football League (NFL), Canadian Football League (CFL) and Arena Football League (AFL). He played college football at Texas Christian (TCU). Petry was drafted by the Kansas City Chiefs in the fourth round of the 1989 NFL Draft. He also played for the Baltimore Stallions of the CFL and Milwaukee Mustangs, Albany Firebirds, Grand Rapids Rampage, Houston ThunderBears, Buffalo Destroyers and New York Dragons of the AFL.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=petrysta001&recsort;=2 ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Players of American football from Texas Category:American football defensive backs Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:TCU Horned Frogs football players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:New Orleans Saints players Category:Baltimore Stallions players Category:Milwaukee Mustangs (1994–2001) players Category:Albany Firebirds players Category:Grand Rapids Rampage players Category:Houston ThunderBears players Category:Buffalo Destroyers players Category:New York Dragons players Category:People from Alvin, Texas
title: Stan Petry
